alert.note: Alert for Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 12:46PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Businesses in low-lying areas near the river are flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 36.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
